name: Mickey Fantasia
description:
Welcome to Mickey Fantasia, a platform game inspired by the the classic Fantasia launched for Mega Drive on 1991. The level is a "replica" from the first level of Super Mario Bros.

Instructions

Use arrow keys/WASD to move Mickey and press the space bar in order to jump. 

Collect gems and reach the end of the level to earn the magic artifact.

Development Information

This game was developed in order to test my initial knowledge about Unity2D.

Assets used:

SunnyLand Woods – ANSIMUZ

Sunny Land - ANSIMUZ

2D Forest Tileset Pack To. – DINV STUDIO

Other sprites taken from: The Spriters Resource

Sounds taken from:

OpenGaemArt.org

m.spritedatabase.net
